name: Pandora's cellar
description:
Sup, I am Munak

Thanks for visiting demo version of PandorasCellar. Pandora's cellar is a novel/dungeon-crawler game where you must make a choise to survive. Full version of a game isn't finished and I formally missed submission date for Horror jam, but if you like style and genre, write a comment! I'll be really glad.

Probably you also can have some issues while tryna run this game if don't have proper jdk. It is because it was made on myself-written java engine.

You can still try out my work after installing jdk version 19 by using installer in folder with game (if version with jdk downloaded) or by using link to oracle in readme file

All bugs can be reported to fixed soon.
